data.message: Well if u been under a rock. Thereve been session with the president and republicians in congress about the future of our economy...well disagreements. Democrats and the prez want to compromise and republicians deny it. De Republicans wants outrages demands and the prez vetos it. So bascially if a black man can't convince a bunch of white ppl that he's right by midnight the goverment is goin to shut dwn...idk about y'all but I'm already packing for canada
